div.a: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1585 Beth-Shan (anc. Nysa-Scythopolis), (148) Samaria, 1921-1923 Burial: after 246 B.C. (Kadman) Contents: 20+ AR. From excavations Ptolemy II: tetradr. Disposition: Philadelphia (Univ. Mus.) Fischer, Penn. Univ. Museum Journal 1923, p. 239 Fitzgerald, Beth-Shan Excavations 1921-23. The Arab and Byzantine Levels (Philadelphia, 1931), p. 33 Kadman, INCJ, hoard 9
